attributes.action: Control newspaper advertising billboards with distressing headlines that children can easily read
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every day at around 9am and 3.30pm
young children that can read walk past news agents with signs or billboards that have distressing news on them. I believe that there should be some control over these things. A recent example was "15 year old boy stabbed to death". Another was "mother and child found dead". I am 8 years old and am not allowed to see movies about this kind of thing. Why should newspapers be allowed to advertise using headlines like this that children can easily read?
